attributes.action: GOVERNMENT BACKED UK SEARCH ENGINE  WITH PROFITS GOING TO PUBLIC SERVICES
attributes.additional_details: The UK government should create its own search engine to rival the likes of Google, funded by the taxpayer with all profits going to support public services, jobs and training for young people, etc, whilst ensuring that it is properly monitored for illegal activities, without infringing the correct use of freedom.  A safe place for children to surf the net, with profits used for the public good and no tax avoidance.
